item.title: Message Type

content.value: Target reports, flight plan data and basic alerts
Manual attachment of flight plan to track
Manual detachment of flight plan to track

item.definition: This Data Item allows for a more convenient handling of the messages at the receiver side by further defining the type of transaction.

item.title: Data Source Identifier

item.name: SAC
item.title: System Area Code Fixed to Zero

item.definition: Identification of the radar station from which the data are received.
item.remark: Note: The SAC is fixed to zero to indicate a data flow local to the airport.

item.title: Service Identification
item.definition: Identification of the service provided to one or more users.
item.remark: Note: The service identification is allocated by the A-SMGCS

item.title: Position in WGS-84 Coordinates

item.name: LAT
item.title: Latitude in WGS-84 in Two's Complement

item.name: LON
item.title: Longitude in WGS-84 in Two's Complement

item.definition: Position of a target in WGS-84 Coordinates.

item.title: Calculated Position in Cartesian Co-ordinates
item.definition: Calculated position of a target in Cartesian co-ordinates (two's complement form).

item.title: Mode-3/A Code in Octal Representation
item.definition: Track Mode-3/A code converted into octal representation.

item.title: Measured Flight Level
item.definition: Last valid and credible flight level used to update the track, in two's complement representation.
item.remark: Note: The criteria to determine the credibility of the flight level are Tracker dependent. Credible means: within reasonable range of change with respect to the previous detection.

item.title: Calculated Track Geometric Altitude
item.definition: Calculated geometric vertical distance above mean sea level, not related to barometric pressure.
item.remark: Note: The source of altitude is identified in bits (SRC) of item I011/170 Track Status.

item.title: Calculated Track Barometric Altitude
item.definition: Calculated Barometric Altitude of the track.

item.title: Time of Track Information
item.definition: Absolute time stamping expressed as UTC.
item.remark: Note: The time of day value is reset to zero each day at midnight.

item.title: Track Number
item.definition: Identification of a fusion track (single track number).

item.title: Track Status

content.value: Transponder Ground bit not set or unknown
Track service end (i.e. last message transmitted to the user for the track)
Track service begin (i.e. first message transmitted to the user for the track)
Military Emergency present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
Military Identification present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
Track not resulting from amalgamation process
SPI present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
Age of the last received track update is higher than system dependent threshold (coasting)
ADS-B data inconsistent with other surveillance information

item.definition: Status of track.

item.title: Calculated Track Velocity in Cartesian Coordinates
item.definition: Calculated track velocity expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates.

item.title: Calculated Acceleration
item.definition: Calculated Acceleration of the target, in two's complement form.

item.title: Calculated Rate Of Climb/Descent
item.definition: Calculated rate of Climb/Descent of an aircraft, in two's complement form.

item.title: Target Identification

content.value: Callsign or registration downlinked from transponder

item.definition: Target (aircraft or vehicle) identification in 8 characters.
item.remark: Note: Characters 1-8 (coded on 6 bits each) defining target identification

item.title: Target Size and Orientation
item.definition: Target size defined as length and with of the detected target, and orientation.
item.remark: Note: The orientation gives the direction which the aircraft nose is pointing, relative to the Geographical North.

item.title: System Track Update Ages

item.name: PSR
item.title: Age of The Last Primary Detection Used to Update the Track

item.name: SSR
item.title: Age of the Last Secondary Detection Used to Update the Track

item.name: MDA
item.title: Age of the Last Mode A Detection Used to Update the Track

item.name: MFL
item.title: Age of the Last Mode C Detection Used to Update the Track

item.name: MDS
item.title: Age of the Last Mode S Detection Used to Update the Track

item.name: ADS
item.title: Age of the Last ADS Report Used to Update the Track

item.name: ADB
item.title: Age of the Last ADS-B Report Used to Update the Track

item.name: MD1
item.title: Age of the Last Valid Mode 1 Used to Update the Track

item.name: MD2
item.title: Age of the Last Mode 2 Used to Update the Track

item.name: LOP
item.title: Age of the Last Magentic Loop Detection

item.name: TRK
item.title: Actual Track Age Since First Occurrence

item.name: MUL
item.title: Age of the Last Multilateration Detection

item.definition: Ages of the last plot/local track, or the last valid mode-A/mode-C, used to update the system track.
item.remark: Note: The ages are counted from Data Item I011/140, Time Of Track Information, using the following formula: Age = Time of track information - Time of last (valid) update If the computed age is greater than the maximum value or if the data has never been received, then the corresponding subfield is not sent.

item.title: Vehicle Fleet Identification
item.definition: Vehicle fleet identification number.

item.title: Pre-programmed Message

content.value: Work in progress (maintenance, birds scarer, sweepers...)

item.definition: Number related to a pre-programmed message that can be transmitted by a vehicle.

item.title: Mode-S / ADS-B Related Data

content.value: Comm. A and Comm. B capability
Comm. A, Comm. B and Uplink ELM
Comm. A, Comm. B, Uplink ELM and Downlink ELM
No alert, no SPI, aircraft airborne
No alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
Alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
Alert, SPI, aircraft airborne or on ground
No alert, SPI, aircraft airborne or on ground
Highly manoeuvrable (5g acceleration capability) and high speed (>400 knots cruise)

item.definition: Data specific to Mode-S ADS-B.

item.title: Flight Plan Related Data
item.definition: All flight plan related information.

item.title: Phase of Flight
item.definition: Current phase of the flight.

item.title: Estimated Accuracies

item.name: X
item.title: Estimated Accuracy of the Calculated Position of X Component

item.name: Y
item.title: Estimated Accuracy of the Calculated Position of Y Component

item.name: X
item.title: Estimated Accuracy of the Calculated Velocity of X Component

item.name: Y
item.title: Estimated Accuracy of the Calculated Velocity of Y Component

item.name: ARC
item.title: Estimated Accuracy Of Rate Of Climb / Descent

item.name: X
item.title: Estimated Accuracy Of Acceleration of X Component

item.name: Y
item.title: Estimated Accuracy Of Acceleration of Y Component

item.definition: Overview of all important accuracies (standard deviations).

item.title: Alert Messages
item.definition: Alert involving the targets indicated in I011/605.

item.title: Tracks in Alert
item.definition: List of track numbers of the targets concerned by the alert described in I011/600.

item.title: Holdbar Status
item.definition: Status of up to sixteen banks of twelve indicators.

item.name: SP
item.title: Special Purpose Field
item.definition: Special Purpose Field

item.name: RE
item.title: Reserved Expansion Field
item.definition: Expansion
